channel.title: Gameplay on Dread's Skyrim Build
channel.description: Recent content in Gameplay on Dread's Skyrim Build

item.title: General
item.description: Better Jumping SE Get the mod GIST - Genuinely Intelligent Soul Trap SE Get the mod Download and install the Main File.

item.title: AI & Combat
item.description: AI Overhaul SSE Get the mod Archery Gameplay Overhaul SE Get the mod Install the main file and the nemesis patch. When installing the nemesis patch, make sure to set the folder named Data as data directory. Mod Organizer will show a warning saying that there is no game data on top level. Ignore this warning. Better Stealth AI for Followers Get the mod Blade and Blunt Get the mod Install the main file.

item.title: Camping & Survival
item.description: There are two supported survival mods to choose from. If you want to use a survival mod, choose either the official Creation Club Survival Mode or the minimalistic mod The Frozen North. Camping Lite (Special Edition) Get the mod The Frozen North - Minimalistic survival overhaul Get the mod Do not use this mod if you use Creation Club Survival Mode. Install the main file The Frozen North.

item.title: Classes & Races
item.description: Aetherius - A Race Overhaul Get the mod Class Overhaul Re-Imagined (SkyRem - Cori) Get the mod Experience Get the mod Do not activate this mod yet. Wait until you have left the first cell of Alternate Start to avoid getting experience when different mods do their initial setup routines. Manbeast - A Werewolf Overhaul Get the mod Scion - A Vampire Overhaul Get the mod

item.title: Crafting
item.description: Ars Metallica - Smithing Enhancement Get the mod Crafting Skills Revamped Get the mod Download the main file and the following optional files: Crafting Skills Revamped - Skyrim Skill Uncapper Patch Potions Restore Over Time More Craftable Equipment Get the mod Download and install the main file and the optional CBBE file.

item.title: Economy & Item Balance
item.description: Trade and Barter Get the mod

item.title: Immersion & Role-Playing
item.description: Carriage and Ferry Travel Overhaul Get the mod Install the main file and the Dawnstar by Arthmoor Patch. Daedric Voices Get the mod Install the main file. Disease Descriptions for the Immersive Adventurer SE Get the mod Guard Dialogue Overhaul SE Get the mod High-Level Loot Rarified Get the mod Install the main file. Select everything in the installer. Hunters Not Bandits Get the mod Download and install Hunters Not Bandits for RDO.

item.title: Magic & Abilities
item.description: Mundus - A Standing Stone Overhaul Get the mod Mysticism - A Magic Overhaul Get the mod Install the main file Thunderchild - Epic Shouts and Immersion Get the mod

item.title: Quests & Stories
item.description: A Lovely Letter Alternate Routes Get the mod Alternate Start - Live Another Life - SSE Get the mod Angi’s Camp Tweaks Get the mod The Brotherhood of Old - Open Beta - SSE Get the mod The Choice is Yours (SE) Get the mod Clockwork (SSE) Get the mod Cutting Room Floor Get the mod Dawnguard and Clan Volkihar Epilogues Get the mod The Forgotten City Get the mod Gildergreen Regrown Get the mod The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal SE Get the mod The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal SSE - HD pack Get the mod Gray Cowl of Nocturnal Alikr Flora Overhaul SE Get the mod Helgen Reborn Get the mod Here We Go Again - World Interactions Get the mod Improved College Entry - Questline Tweaks Get the mod Improved Companions - Questline Tweaks Get the mod Moon and Star Get the mod Moonpath to Elsweyr SSE Get the mod More Radiant Quests for the Companions Get the mod Choose Option 1 in the installer (suggestion)

item.title: Skills & Perks
item.description: Adamant - A Perk Overhaul Get the mod Install the main file and the optional Adamant Addons - Shrines and Amulets. If this mod is updated midgame from 3.x to 4.x, use Ish’s Respec Mod to reclaim your perk points before updating. Ish’s Respec Mod adds a potion to vendors that can be added to your inventory using the console. Use the help command in the console to find the item id for the potion, Draught of Fate Unwound.
